= Juice - "The simplest extension" =

== Introduction ==

The simplest form of extension to an interface is to add some simple text and possibly a link on to the page.

This How-to is the second in the series of Juice How-to guides.  It assumes that you have stepped your way through the first one - [HowToHelloWorld How-to - "hello world"] - so you will have succesfully added Juice to your interface.

In this guide we will build on those previous steps we will make use of the !SimpleInsert extension.
